S.FORM: djian gu('inamizukuan:cikasuan；pinairangan:Kiat-an-hiong；nginaingayngan:gidˋ onˊ hiongˊ/gid onˋ hiongˋ)i maza i pasakacedas a viri tua taiwan a kaliku king, a i viri nakidjekec tua hualien hici, a i tjaikacedas na kicevung tua taipingyan, pasamaza i ledepan kicencen ta i siulin, a i navalj kicaing tua i suvung gu. izua tu alu a kudraw sa sepatj a kuzulj a caucau, avan nu sikamasan musalj a tjuruvuan a kinateveteveljan na caucau. tjaljatjuruvuruvuan uta tua na sikataqaljan a gu i taiwan. kasitucuan a caviljan, aza kalingu kingsihu kata taikai a kipuvarung tu papirazek tua i pasanavalj a djian, mavan a kinateveteveljan nua mareka kuba tucu, izuanga a makakaizuazua a kakivangavangan, izua tatekelan ta kafee, papacunan ta iga, nu pakalingdjelj tua imaza i huilan a hici, kimaya tja papamaw a mirazekan ca i navalj kata kaledep nua djian, sa pakacu tua sikamanguwaqan. kadjunangan a gadugaduan a kadjunangan nua i djian izua a qevas 15%, a tjeza a 85% avan za djian a pana kata muka a pana a siqaljudjan a vudavudasan masan lizuk. tjaljeqaca tu seljenguaq a pinukadjunangan, a kalevelevan semezan tu kemaledeledev. a pakata sikataqaljan izua matjasepatj a zukuan, pairang, haka, ciyukuk kata kacalisian. tjalja mirazekan a pakata nugiu kata kuba, masan tadjalan a mirazek imaza kata hualien hici. a pakata djian a caucau, a izua kinasi tua sicuayan a gukusiu, sitjaisangasan a hici a palingulj kata i pasa hualien hici, avananga vaquan a hici. izua dungcang, beicang, nancang, yicang, yicang, taicang, cinvung, renli, yungan kata senan a mula. izua lima kudraw kata sepatj a kuzulj a caucau, mavan qemavas tu 60% pakata penuljat a caucau i kalinkuking. lja pazangal a kakavelian a umaq i hualien hici saka tjuruvu a cuacau imaza, sika a pasataljiqacain tua kaizuanan. a pinaljavakan a i pasakaledep kata pasanavalj nua djian gu, avan a lizulizuk, tjaliaw a semancan, saka tjamavekelj a caucau izua. a kai 'inamizukuan kata nginaingayngan. cinalivatan aza djian gu na amizuku a kakaizuanan, ka sicuayan a pinaka "cikasuan", aza a imi 'inamizukuan "liaw a kasivan (cikasoyay) a kadjunangan" aya. avan a sepaljavak tua 南勢阿美族 izua cikasuwan , lidaw , natawran , pukpuk a mareka qinaljan a kadjunangan. ka ripung a djiday, tjaivililj ta cidjawcuan a marivuan, masuvur a cidjawcuan a qinaljan. ka 1910 a caviljan, aza ripung sihu pakerengen ta ripung caucau patje maza i kalinku kata valangaw a kadjunangan, saka lemingdjelj ta djiye mula i mamaw ta kadjunangan a cidjawcuan mula. au izua matjatjelu a qinaljan, kungcian , cinsui kata cauven ka 1920 a caviljan, pavalitan tua drusa a ci , djiye ci kata pinye ci. ka 1937 a cavilj, djiye ci pavalitan lemintje ta djiye zuang , sipavecik pakalingukangting kalingudjin sa pucapilj. saka kapuamin a maqaqeci, lemintje djiye guan i kalinkuking, lja sa ripung aravac aya, ka 1948 a caviljan pavalitan ta djian gu, a patjetucu a kinipungadan. caucau kemasi 2020 a caviljan puluq sa drusa a qiljas, izua 83,507 a cuacau i maza, aza kinatjuruvuan a caucau izua 1,280 a caucau /km², avan tjatjuruvuan kata masansikapitjulj a mavalidan pakata guan i taiwan. lja aza kuisan guan pavalitan tua kuisan ci i tawyan hici, djian guan masan ta tjuruvuan a guan, saka tucu avan ta masansikanemelj a qinaljan, avan tauta masansikasimuluq saka pitju pakata caucau a kinapangaljan a paljavak. caucau a mapavalitan kemasi 1981 a caviljan a caucau matjuruvu a caucau a ljemita a cavilj, amin ka 2004, 2005, 2018, 2020 ca sepatj a caviljan nameljiateku, aza 35 a caviljan nameljiavavaw. qepuing a lima cavilj (2015-2020) tja metjuruvu tu 267 a caucau, nu teveljeng nametjuruvu tu 0.32％, a sika liavan itua kalingu 13 a a kinapangaljan a paljavak, pasakacedas penuljat a kana guan ta sitjuruvuan masandrusa(tja keri ta siulin), sika mirazekan ta caucau, niban ta i kalingu, i kacedasan masanlima a liawvan. guciu paljavak tua katjunangan zuku izua pairang, haka, ciyukuk, amizuku kata turukuzuku. namaqaqeljiqeljing namarkiljivaljivak a taqinaljanaljan, izuazua a kakudanan niamadju, ika nasetevelj kata pairang a kakudanan. saka temalidu aravac a kakudanan a qinaljan imaza. pairang ka 16 a caviljan, izuanga pairang na kiciul ta gungkang a mamaza i djian a qemuma, kiracev. ka 1874 a caviljan, ti senpaucen kipuvarung tua sihu tu semandjalang ta makacedas, kamaqatianga a ljitaladj, qivu tua kemasi tailik paka ljaviljaving a kacedasan manavalj a caucau tu patjavat a semamaza, kata ripung djiday, kemasi taiwan kaledepan a napatjavat a ninpu, nugiw kilevuci a mamaza i kacedas, avan nusika pairang tjalja tjuruvuan a zuku, aza pinairangan masan nasi palingraku kata i sasaw a kai. haka ka 1812 a caviljan, ti lihen kata ti zuangzau cemiyur ta pairang, haka a caucau tu patjavat a kemasi kemalan a tjeljaving a patje cilay lizu italadj. aicu rikisi mavan ca sangasangasan a vecik pakata pairang sema i kalingu, sika patagilj qemuma imaza a haka. ka ripung a djiday, a ripung a reminlin a patjavat ta qinaljan, izua tjuruvu a haka ninpu kata nugiw a semamaza i kacedas. tiamadju tjatjuruvu kemasi tauyen , sinzu kata miawli , ninpu na ripun temalem ta paulin. ka 1980 a cavilj, maqati pakazua kisiya a djalan a cemalivat tua taiwan i pasa viri, saka mirazek ta djian guan, izua tjuruvu a haka semamaza. tucu, djian guan masan ta tjatjuruvuanga a haka a qinaljan nua i kalinkuking. ciyukuk ka 1949 a caviljan, aza kumintang makilu a kiqeci ta kiusantu, kemasi tailik a gaisiuzing kata sividay kilevuci a semamaza i hualien a kitju umaq, tiamadju sedjel a nasividay. lja za i hualien kaizuanan na mapeljuq anga, sika cemikel a pasa djian gu i navalj tua kuanghua a qinaljan, katua imaza i muka pana pasakacedas a kadjunangan a kemaizuangan. kacalisian aza i kalinkuking tjalja tjuruvuan a amizuku i djian, izua 15,273 a kacalisian, naqemavas tua kalinkuking nakacalisian a caucau 12.73％ (107 a caviljan pitju qiljas a sinupu). au tjalja tjuruvuan a amizuku kimaya 12,219 a caucau, a zumanga avan za ripung a djiday a kemasi siulin gu setavun kata cinsui qinaljan sinavuta a patjavat a pasataluku. kimaya 1,922 a caucau, tucuanga izua sebunun kata maretimalji a zuku kimaya 1,132 a caucau nasemamaza kitevelj. amizuku puluq a siva a ainaljan naseamizuku izua lidaw , taraca , isawalian pahikukian , isaetipan pahikukian , atonan , cikeliwan , citekudan , kungkung , mabuwakay , hacining , cikasuwan , sirakesay , sarad , fulufuluan , alang miyamay , buner , natawran , pukpuk , ciyibangcalay . turukuzuku sepatj a qinaljan naseturukuzuku izua ciripunan , alang kiyumi , alang mkibuhw kata alang gnaalu a qinaljan. nasidjaravacan djian gu imaza i pasakacedas a viri a kalingku a sema taitu sevesevec a lizulizuk a kadjunangan tua taiwan a kalingu king, a i viri nakidjekec tua hualien hici, a i tjaikacedas na kicevung tua taipingyan, a pasamaza ledepan kicencen ta i siuling gu, a i navalj kicaing tua i suvung. lja demut ta hualien hici, seljenguaq a nasidjaravacan, izua kisiya a djalan, basu a kalingu, masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan kata masansimuluq sa ita a djalanan i taiwan pakamaza. izua a disiaba i djian. pakata basu izua masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan, masansivalj a bin a djalanan i taiwan, masansimuluq sa ita a djalanan i taiwan kata kalingu sevesevec a lizulizuka djalanan kemasi disiaba i kalingu, au izua alu a pubasuan, aza caucau maqati itjen kisedjam ta utubay tu zidingsia a kemasi disiaba i kalingu patje djian guan. sinupuan kinsic nugiu djian gu imaza a kadjunangan avan za djian a pana kata muka a pana siniqaljud vudavudasan masan lizuk. tjaljeqaca tu seljenguwaq a kadjunangan, saka izua tu lima kuzulj a marutarauljan maqati a masengseng taquma. avan ta sinika pazangal nua lami pakata kalinku king. izua paday, vurasi, siak, vuday, aljualju a kamangulj, kucay, vasa, ngaingaw na hayatuli, karasina kata kudamunu. au pakata vasa masansikmatjelj a tjaliaw a sinitalem a racev i taiwan. pakata ngaingaw na hayatuli avan tjaljaqacavan a tinaleman a kadjunangan, a sinitalem a kadjunangan qemavas 43% i taiwan. kuba kuanghua kuba zunghua kuba pakata qadupu siubay kivangavangan racev

djian go('inamizokoan:cikasoan；pinairangan:Kiat-an-hiong；nginaingayngan:gidˋ onˊ hiongˊ/gid onˋ hiongˋ)i maza i pasakacedas a viri toa taiwan a kaliko king, a i viri nakidjekec toa hoalien hici, a i tjaikacedas na kicevong toa taipingyan, pasamaza i ledepan kicencen ta i siolin, a i navalj kicaing toa i sovong go. izoa to alo a kodraw sa sepatj a kozolj a caocao, avan no sikamasan mosalj a tjorovoan a kinateveteveljan na caocao. tjaljatjorovorovoan ota toa na sikataqaljan a go i taiwan. kasitocoan a caviljan, aza kalingo kingsiho kata taikai a kipovarong to papirazek toa i pasanavalj a djian, mavan a kinateveteveljan noa mareka koba toco, izoanga a makakaizoazoa a kakivangavangan, izoa tatekelan ta kafee, papaconan ta iga, no pakalingdjelj toa imaza i hoilan a hici, kimaya tja papamaw a mirazekan ca i navalj kata kaledep noa djian, sa pakaco toa sikamangowaqan. kadjonangan a gadogadoan a kadjonangan noa i djian izoa a qevas 15%, a tjeza a 85% avan za djian a pana kata moka a pana a siqaljodjan a vodavodasan masan lizok. tjaljeqaca to seljengoaq a pinokadjonangan, a kalevelevan semezan to kemaledeledev. a pakata sikataqaljan izoa matjasepatj a zokoan, pairang, haka, ciyokok kata kacalisian. tjalja mirazekan a pakata nogio kata koba, masan tadjalan a mirazek imaza kata hoalien hici. a pakata djian a caocao, a izoa kinasi toa sicoayan a gokosio, sitjaisangasan a hici a palingolj kata i pasa hoalien hici, avananga vaqoan a hici. izoa dongcang, beicang, nancang, yicang, yicang, taicang, cinvong, renli, yongan kata senan a mola. izoa lima kodraw kata sepatj a kozolj a caocao, mavan qemavas to 60% pakata penoljat a caocao i kalinkoking. lja pazangal a kakavelian a omaq i hoalien hici saka tjorovo a coacao imaza, sika a pasataljiqacain toa kaizoanan. a pinaljavakan a i pasakaledep kata pasanavalj noa djian go, avan a lizolizok, tjaliaw a semancan, saka tjamavekelj a caocao izoa. a kai 'inamizokoan kata nginaingayngan. cinalivatan aza djian go na amizoko a kakaizoanan, ka sicoayan a pinaka "cikasoan", aza a imi 'inamizokoan "liaw a kasivan (cikasoyay) a kadjonangan" aya. avan a sepaljavak toa 南勢阿美族 izoa cikasowan , lidaw , natawran , pokpok a mareka qinaljan a kadjonangan. ka ripong a djiday, tjaivililj ta cidjawcoan a marivoan, masovor a cidjawcoan a qinaljan. ka 1910 a caviljan, aza ripong siho pakerengen ta ripong caocao patje maza i kalinko kata valangaw a kadjonangan, saka lemingdjelj ta djiye mola i mamaw ta kadjonangan a cidjawcoan mola. ao izoa matjatjelo a qinaljan, kongcian , cinsoi kata caoven ka 1920 a caviljan, pavalitan toa drosa a ci , djiye ci kata pinye ci. ka 1937 a cavilj, djiye ci pavalitan lemintje ta djiye zoang , sipavecik pakalingokangting kalingodjin sa pocapilj. saka kapoamin a maqaqeci, lemintje djiye goan i kalinkoking, lja sa ripong aravac aya, ka 1948 a caviljan pavalitan ta djian go, a patjetoco a kinipongadan. caocao kemasi 2020 a caviljan poloq sa drosa a qiljas, izoa 83,507 a coacao i maza, aza kinatjorovoan a caocao izoa 1,280 a caocao /km², avan tjatjorovoan kata masansikapitjolj a mavalidan pakata goan i taiwan. lja aza koisan goan pavalitan toa koisan ci i tawyan hici, djian goan masan ta tjorovoan a goan, saka toco avan ta masansikanemelj a qinaljan, avan taota masansikasimoloq saka pitjo pakata caocao a kinapangaljan a paljavak. caocao a mapavalitan kemasi 1981 a caviljan a caocao matjorovo a caocao a ljemita a cavilj, amin ka 2004, 2005, 2018, 2020 ca sepatj a caviljan nameljiateko, aza 35 a caviljan nameljiavavaw. qepoing a lima cavilj (2015-2020) tja metjorovo to 267 a caocao, no teveljeng nametjorovo to 0.32％, a sika liavan itoa kalingo 13 a a kinapangaljan a paljavak, pasakacedas penoljat a kana goan ta sitjorovoan masandrosa(tja keri ta siolin), sika mirazekan ta caocao, niban ta i kalingo, i kacedasan masanlima a liawvan. gocio paljavak toa katjonangan zoko izoa pairang, haka, ciyokok, amizoko kata torokozoko. namaqaqeljiqeljing namarkiljivaljivak a taqinaljanaljan, izoazoa a kakodanan niamadjo, ika nasetevelj kata pairang a kakodanan. saka temalido aravac a kakodanan a qinaljan imaza. pairang ka 16 a caviljan, izoanga pairang na kiciol ta gongkang a mamaza i djian a qemoma, kiracev. ka 1874 a caviljan, ti senpaocen kipovarong toa siho to semandjalang ta makacedas, kamaqatianga a ljitaladj, qivo toa kemasi tailik paka ljaviljaving a kacedasan manavalj a caocao to patjavat a semamaza, kata ripong djiday, kemasi taiwan kaledepan a napatjavat a ninpo, nogiw kilevoci a mamaza i kacedas, avan nosika pairang tjalja tjorovoan a zoko, aza pinairangan masan nasi palingrako kata i sasaw a kai. haka ka 1812 a caviljan, ti lihen kata ti zoangzao cemiyor ta pairang, haka a caocao to patjavat a kemasi kemalan a tjeljaving a patje cilay lizo italadj. aico rikisi mavan ca sangasangasan a vecik pakata pairang sema i kalingo, sika patagilj qemoma imaza a haka. ka ripong a djiday, a ripong a reminlin a patjavat ta qinaljan, izoa tjorovo a haka ninpo kata nogiw a semamaza i kacedas. tiamadjo tjatjorovo kemasi taoyen , sinzo kata miawli , ninpo na ripon temalem ta paolin. ka 1980 a cavilj, maqati pakazoa kisiya a djalan a cemalivat toa taiwan i pasa viri, saka mirazek ta djian goan, izoa tjorovo a haka semamaza. toco, djian goan masan ta tjatjorovoanga a haka a qinaljan noa i kalinkoking. ciyokok ka 1949 a caviljan, aza komintang makilo a kiqeci ta kiosanto, kemasi tailik a gaisiozing kata sividay kilevoci a semamaza i hoalien a kitjo omaq, tiamadjo sedjel a nasividay. lja za i hoalien kaizoanan na mapeljoq anga, sika cemikel a pasa djian go i navalj toa koanghoa a qinaljan, katoa imaza i moka pana pasakacedas a kadjonangan a kemaizoangan. kacalisian aza i kalinkoking tjalja tjorovoan a amizoko i djian, izoa 15,273 a kacalisian, naqemavas toa kalinkoking nakacalisian a caocao 12.73％ (107 a caviljan pitjo qiljas a sinopo). ao tjalja tjorovoan a amizoko kimaya 12,219 a caocao, a zomanga avan za ripong a djiday a kemasi siolin go setavon kata cinsoi qinaljan sinavota a patjavat a pasataloko. kimaya 1,922 a caocao, tocoanga izoa sebonon kata maretimalji a zoko kimaya 1,132 a caocao nasemamaza kitevelj. amizoko poloq a siva a ainaljan naseamizoko izoa lidaw , taraca , isawalian pahikokian , isaetipan pahikokian , atonan , cikeliwan , citekodan , kongkong , mabowakay , hacining , cikasowan , sirakesay , sarad , folofoloan , alang miyamay , boner , natawran , pokpok , ciyibangcalay . torokozoko sepatj a qinaljan nasetorokozoko izoa ciriponan , alang kiyomi , alang mkibohw kata alang gnaalo a qinaljan. nasidjaravacan djian go imaza i pasakacedas a viri a kalingko a sema taito sevesevec a lizolizok a kadjonangan toa taiwan a kalingo king, a i viri nakidjekec toa hoalien hici, a i tjaikacedas na kicevong toa taipingyan, a pasamaza ledepan kicencen ta i sioling go, a i navalj kicaing toa i sovong. lja demot ta hoalien hici, seljengoaq a nasidjaravacan, izoa kisiya a djalan, baso a kalingo, masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan kata masansimoloq sa ita a djalanan i taiwan pakamaza. izoa a disiaba i djian. pakata baso izoa masansivalj a djalanan i taiwan, masansivalj a bin a djalanan i taiwan, masansimoloq sa ita a djalanan i taiwan kata kalingo sevesevec a lizolizoka djalanan kemasi disiaba i kalingo, ao izoa alo a pobasoan, aza caocao maqati itjen kisedjam ta otobay to zidingsia a kemasi disiaba i kalingo patje djian goan. sinopoan kinsic nogio djian go imaza a kadjonangan avan za djian a pana kata moka a pana siniqaljod vodavodasan masan lizok. tjaljeqaca to seljengowaq a kadjonangan, saka izoa to lima kozolj a marotaraoljan maqati a masengseng taqoma. avan ta sinika pazangal noa lami pakata kalinko king. izoa paday, vorasi, siak, voday, aljoaljo a kamangolj, kocay, vasa, ngaingaw na hayatoli, karasina kata kodamono. ao pakata vasa masansikmatjelj a tjaliaw a sinitalem a racev i taiwan. pakata ngaingaw na hayatoli avan tjaljaqacavan a tinaleman a kadjonangan, a sinitalem a kadjonangan qemavas 43% i taiwan. koba koanghoa koba zonghoa koba pakata qadopo siobay kivangavangan racev
